title: Fort Bowie National Historic Site: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go          Entrance to Fort Bowie   Â    Visitor Center Stop by the Visitor Center for information, tours, and to see artifacts in our museum.The visitor center is open daily from 8 am to 4 pm, and closed December 25. Phone 520-847-2500 Location From Willcox, AZ drive southeast for 20 miles on State Road #186 to the Fort Bowie turn off, then drive another eight miles on the unpaved road to the Fort Bowie Trailhead. Be prepared to walk the three miles round trip to the ruins and back to your car. From the town of Bowie, AZ the trailhead is located on Apache Pass Road, 13 miles south. The park is 116 miles east of Tucson, AZ via I-10, and 227 miles from Phoenix, AZ.
